Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Nagas have been guarding the first floor of the Temple.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:42#100#besharan slaves}, {@LinkCreature:42#400#besharan runners}, {@LinkCreature:42#500#vigilant chikas}, {@LinkCreature:42#600#skeletal watchers}, {@LinkCreature:42#710#cruel bone imps}, and {@LinkCreature:42#1300#besharan sellswords}.

Report to Esrill when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
